title: Random crashes with status=3/NOTIMPLEMENTED

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
I run syncthing with `systemd --user` and it crashes quite often (especially after resume from suspend) with this log:

```
Feb 01 20:46:48 alderaan syncthing[2724]: [TYZZZ] 20:46:48 INFO: Completed initial scan (rw) of folder camera
Feb 01 20:46:49 alderaan syncthing[2724]: [TYZZZ] 20:46:49 INFO: Completed initial scan (rw) of folder dokumente
Feb 01 20:47:26 alderaan syncthing[2724]: [TYZZZ] 20:47:26 INFO: Established secure connection to GDACTPT-HASVGSG-BVKYKA2-AVHRWHN-TNOQ7IG-HSCGH43-G5FT4V7-RD2T5QU at ...
Feb 01 20:47:26 alderaan syncthing[2724]: [TYZZZ] 20:47:26 INFO: Device GDACTPT-HASVGSG-BVKYKA2-AVHRWHN-TNOQ7IG-HSCGH43-G5FT4V7-RD2T5QU client is "syncthing v0.10.21"
Feb 01 20:47:26 alderaan syncthing[2724]: [TYZZZ] 20:47:26 INFO: Device GDACTPT-HASVGSG-BVKYKA2-AVHRWHN-TNOQ7IG-HSCGH43-G5FT4V7-RD2T5QU name is "archvm"
Feb 01 22:54:15 alderaan syncthing[2724]: [TYZZZ] 22:54:15 INFO: Restarting
Feb 01 22:54:15 alderaan syncthing[2724]: [TYZZZ] 22:54:15 OK: Exiting
Feb 01 22:54:15 alderaan systemd[2721]: syncthing.service: main process exited, code=exited, status=3/NOTIMPLEMENTED
Feb 01 22:54:15 alderaan systemd[2721]: Unit syncthing.service entered failed state.
Feb 01 22:54:15 alderaan systemd[2721]: syncthing.service failed.
```

What exactly does `status=3/NOTIMPLEMENTED` mean? How can I provide more information?

```
# /usr/lib/systemd/user/syncthing.service
[Unit]
Description=Syncthing service for %u
After=network.target

[Service]
Environment=STNORESTART=yes
ExecStart=/usr/bin/syncthing
Restart=on-success

[Install]
WantedBy=default.target
```

```
$ syncthing --version
syncthing v0.10.21 (go1.4.1 linux-amd64 default) builduser@jara 2015-01-19 20:40:36 UTC
```
